message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a price that I think is fair. I'm willing to let you have it for $110.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
I understand you like the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I can sell it to you for $105.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I really want this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. How about $100?
